nodes.name: Spirits of the Sea
nodes.summary: For modjamI'm creatively bankrupt so im just adding ghosts to the sea of ghosts :pThis is done in the following ways:-Adds sea ghosts off the northern shores of

nodes.name: Caius High As Fuck
nodes.summary: Mesh edit of Caius Cosades head.

nodes.name: Ramsey Dewey Master Trainer of Balmora
nodes.summary: Adds master trainer in hand to hand that you can spar with to Balmora

nodes.name: SUDS
nodes.summary: This MWSE mod gives NPCs and creatures a max health bonus scaled to player level.

nodes.name: MWSE F.A.L.L.
nodes.summary: Jump velocity decreases with fatigue ratio. requires MWSE

nodes.name: NIR
nodes.summary: NPC's Interrupt Rest

nodes.name: Find Jiub
nodes.summary: He wakes you up, and never gets off the boat. Or does he?

nodes.name: walk fatigue
nodes.summary: MWSE mod drains stamina 1 point/sec when walking

nodes.name: Exquisite Robe Material Restoration and Feature Creep
nodes.summary: this is a modification of the Exquisite Robe

nodes.name: MWSE NPC RANDOM FACE GENERATOR
nodes.summary: Randomizes heads and hairs on generic NPCs

nodes.name: MWSE NPC RANDOM NAME GENERATOR
nodes.summary: Aleist3r's name generator adapted to give names to generic NPCs

nodes.name: High Ground
nodes.summary: The high ground increases chances of landing a hit

nodes.name: Relentless Dark Brotherhood
nodes.summary: As the title implies, this mod makes the Dark Brotherhood assassins relentless in their pursuit to murder you.

nodes.name: Vampiric Bloodline Visages
nodes.summary: MWSE required. There are 3 vampire bloodlines in the vanilla game and they all look the same, this mod attempts to give each bloodline a visual distinction

nodes.name: Stripes the Cat
nodes.summary: I made this for my kids when they were little. They liked to play but were terrified of mudcrabs so I made them a companion protector based off the family cat.

nodes.name: MWSE - Morag Tong Helmets
nodes.summary: MWSE mod that gives all members of the Morag Tong a random helmet if they aren't already wearing one.

nodes.name: Water Flow Markers Alpha
nodes.summary: advanced water physics, simple mod

nodes.name: rations
nodes.summary: Just a simple mod adding some flavor items that may be useful to starting characters.

nodes.name: WMD Weapons of Misc Distraction
nodes.summary: Throw misc items

nodes.name: Daedric Travel Network
nodes.summary: Six new fast travel locations to daedric ruins on the coasts of Vvardenfell.

nodes.name: Harder Battle
nodes.summary: Randomly fortifies attributes of NPCs and creatures when they attack the player.

nodes.name: S'wit Out Of Luck
nodes.summary: Each day your luck can change.

nodes.name: Slaughtery Slaughterfish
nodes.summary: Slaughterfish attack NPCs that swim near them. Requires MWSE

nodes.name: Safety In Numbers
nodes.summary: When resting with one or more companions following you, you will not be interrupted by region creatures. Requires MWSE

nodes.name: Trays Itemized MWSE
nodes.summary: Static trays are replaced with misc items

nodes.name: Fargoths Game
nodes.summary: For summer Modjam.

nodes.name: Companion Stop
nodes.summary: Stops all player followers with a single keypress. requires MWSE

nodes.name: Web Sweeper
nodes.summary: a morrowind immersion mod

nodes.name: Sorting Hat
nodes.summary: Can't decide which great house to join on your next playthrough? Let the sorting hat decide for you.

nodes.name: Nightsisters
nodes.summary: For the Starwind modding competition. Adds a playable race and companion to the total conversion Starwind

nodes.name: Arrow Catch (and block)
nodes.summary: Player and NPCs can catch or block arrows, bolts, and thrown weapons. Requires MWSE

nodes.name: Boundless Summons
nodes.summary: Scripted spells that combine bound weapons with telekinesis. Summon an axe, sword, spear, dagger, mace, shield, or arrows to fight along side you until they are destroyed or spell

nodes.name: Welcome To Morrowind MWSE
nodes.summary: MWSE recursive cliffracer mod

nodes.name: Tamrielic Tomahawks
nodes.summary: Adds new throwing axes to the game available for purchase, distributed through Wares leveled lists.

nodes.name: Best Spell Readied Animation Replacer
nodes.summary: Replaces spell readied animation with dabbing. Requires LizTail's AnimKit.

nodes.name: Dungeons Rest
nodes.summary: Hostile NPCs and creatures' health, magic, and fatigue are reset to full when you enter interior cells

nodes.name: Ash Hole
nodes.summary: Adds a small cave at the top of Red Mountain along the foyada Mamaea to take refuge from the blight and corpus monsters.

nodes.name: Griefers
nodes.summary: This mod simulates the best and greatest part of multiplayer gaming

nodes.name: Keep Gaea Artoria
nodes.summary: Keep Gaea Artoria as a follower after the quest

nodes.name: Redoran Hortator Armor Chest
nodes.summary: The armor can be found in a locked chest in the Ald-ruhn practice room. There is no key but the chest will open for the Ring of the Hortator.

nodes.name: TES6 Stats MWSE
nodes.summary: Equalizes health magicka and fatigue in real time. WARNING this will make changes to your character that can't be reverted. Back up your saves before enabling.

nodes.name: Graphic Herbalism- Ash Yam Collision Switch
nodes.summary: No longer get stuck on phantom ash yams

nodes.name: Hold Your Breath
nodes.summary: Endurance determines how long you can hold your breath under water. MWSE

nodes.name: PC Voice MWSE
nodes.summary: makes your player character talk. needs MWSE.

nodes.name: Fatigued Faint
nodes.summary: A fatigue effects blackout and collapse effect I scripted for S.U.F.F.E.R. (Stripes' Ultimate Full Fatigue Effects and Regeneration) but now in it's own mod so don't have to suffer

nodes.name: Companion Combat Communication
nodes.summary: Allows dialogue with followers in combat simply by looking at them and pressing a key

nodes.name: Ashlander Huntress Companion
nodes.summary: made at the last minute for Summer Modjam 2020

nodes.name: Kurapli Seeks Justice
nodes.summary: A minor overhaul of a minor quest.Part of Summer ModJam 2020

nodes.name: MWSE Enhanced Healer Companion
nodes.summary: MWSE Enhanced Healer Companion

nodes.name: Notifications
nodes.summary: Notifies you with details via messagebox when some events occur.

nodes.name: Find Shelter MWSE
nodes.summary: "This simple mod adds the need to find shelter in order to sleep in rough weather."

nodes.name: MWSE F.A.S.T.
nodes.summary: All NPC's, Creatures, and the Player will move faster at full fatigue and slower as their fatigue drains.

nodes.name: S.U.F.F.E.R.
nodes.summary: Stripes' Ultimate Full Fatigue Effects and Regeneration

nodes.name: Do It Yourself Weather Effects
nodes.summary: Adds a magical effect to your character depending on the weather.

nodes.name: Time Scale Menu
nodes.summary: Adds a Mod Configuration Menu to adjust the ratio of game time to real time.

nodes.name: TimeScale Friendly Purist Health and Magicka Regen
nodes.summary: A purists friendly regen mod for players that don't use the default timescale

nodes.name: Buoyant Lord Vivec
nodes.summary: Adds a simple script to make Vivec properly loop his idle animation

nodes.name: Solstheim Mage Tower Lite for TOTSP
nodes.summary: A slimmed down reboot of the classic Solstheim Mage Tower mod by Dr No, so can be used with Tomb of the Snow Prince anthology location.

nodes.name: HOT for NPCs
nodes.summary: Heal Over Time for all NPCs and creatures

nodes.name: Wild Goblins
nodes.summary: Adds wild goblins to the leveled creature lists

nodes.name: The Rack and Ruin
nodes.summary: A hidden smuggler tavern, skooma den, and player home near the mouth of the Odai River

nodes.name: Immersive Fatigue
nodes.summary: Basically you run faster and jump higher with full fatigue and get slower and jump lower the less fatigue you have.

nodes.name: Physical Wellness
nodes.summary: Gives player weakness to common diseases when at low health percentage and a slight resistance to common diseases when at half health or more health

nodes.name: F.A.T.
nodes.summary: Buffs/debuffs acrobatics by fatigue ratio

nodes.name: F.A.S.T.
nodes.summary: Buffs/debuffs athletics by fatigue ratio. Basically you run faster with full fatigue and get slower and slower the less fatigue you have.

nodes.name: A Simple Bag of Holding
nodes.summary: A crude, simple, OpenMW friendly  portable container.

nodes.name: REEEE Random Enchantment Encounters Expanded Enhanced
nodes.summary: Adds new enchanted items to leveled lists

nodes.name: SPUNT
nodes.summary: A health and magicka regeneration mod based on fatigue and integrated with attribute debuffs and regeneration penalties for not sleeping.

nodes.name: Daedric Crossbow
nodes.summary: Adds a merchant to Ghostgate that sells an extremely kitbashed daedric crossbowpart of Winter Mod Jam 2020

nodes.name: Ash Helms
nodes.summary: Made for Winter Mod Jam 2020Being in ashstorms will drain endurance and fatigueunless you wear certain native Dunmer closed helmets

nodes.name: Hirstaang Cabin
nodes.summary: A humble log cabin located in Hirstaang Forest near the Isinfier Plains.Updated for Tomb of the Snow Prince  version 2.2.2Not compatible with vanilla Solstheim

nodes.name: Stripes Random Resources
nodes.summary: A place for me to store and share some of my crap

nodes.name: The Great Crate Rock
nodes.summary: Modders Resource. Some assembly may be required. Batteries not included.

nodes.name: Hortator_Ring_Unique_and_Improved
nodes.summary: changes appearance and enchantment of the Ring of Hortator

nodes.name: Imperial Longsword
nodes.summary: A simple low poly sword using vanilla textures

nodes.name: Orcish Crossbow
nodes.summary: Adds a new crossbow to the game that you can purchase or steal

nodes.name: ULF
nodes.summary: Ulf, a wolf companion

nodes.name: Lich Form
nodes.summary: Adds a scripted spell to transform into a lich with resistance and magicka buffs.

nodes.name: Creature Casting Animation Patch
nodes.summary: Adds spell casting notetracks in the animation files for all vanilla creatures that did not have it.

nodes.name: Helnim Housepod
nodes.summary: Puts a vacant house next to the abandoned house in Helnim. Lease is good till 2090
